svt_axi_master_reg_transaction Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for class svt_axi_master_reg_transaction:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The master reg transaction class extends from the AXI master transaction class. The master reg transaction class contains the constraints specific to uvm reg adapter.


Public Member Functions

function void  new ( string name = "svt_axi_master_reg_transaction", svt_axi_port_configuration port_cfg_handle = null )

Member Constraint Documentation

  constraint
 svt_axi_master_reg_transaction::reasonable_master_transaction_uvm_reg

constraint reasonable_master_transaction_uvm_reg {
   if ((port_cfg.axi_interface_type == svt_axi_port_configuration::AXI_ACE) || (port_cfg.axi_interface_type == svt_axi_port_configuration::ACE_LITE)) {
     allocate_in_cache == 0;
     cache_type == 0;
     domain_type == svt_axi_transaction::SYSTEMSHAREABLE;
  }
     id == 0;
     prot_type == svt_axi_transaction::DATA_SECURE_NORMAL;
     bready_delay == 0;
 }
